function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments in sewage","Impact":"Risk of disease reemergence in urban areas","Mitigation":"Environmental surveillance and monitoring of sewage","Technologies":"WHO protocol for sewage treatment, WBE for prompt detection","People":"Population in urban areas","Owner":"Health organizations, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Silent reintroduction and transmission of wild poliovirus type 1 in sewage","Impact":"Risk of poliovirus transmission without clinical cases reported","Mitigation":"Routine environmental surveillance on sewage samples","Technologies":"Environmental surveillance technology","People":"Population in affected areas","Owner":"Health organizations, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Applicability of WBE to SARS-CoV-2 for prompt detection","Impact":"Uncertainty in virus detection and outbreak assessment","Mitigation":"Further research to clarify WBE applicability","Technologies":"WBE technology for viral outbreak assessment","People":"Research institutions, public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
